message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly valuable.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $11000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell it to you for 10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for 10800.
